nodes.text: Ubrikkian Transports was a company that produced the Nightsister speeder, a model of speeder bike used by the Nightsisters of the planet Dathomir during the Clone Wars. The vehicle was an unusual variation on standard speeder design, and little was known about it due to the secretive nature of the Nightsisters.

Ubrikkian Transports was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars Encyclopedia of Starfighters and Other Vehicles, which was written by Landry Q. Walker. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook, a 1993 supplement written by Michael Allen Horne for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
